Interface AsyncMessagePosterService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncMessagePosterServiceImpl
public interface AsyncMessagePosterService
The main service to post message.

      <T> void postMessage(@NotNull @NotBlank @NotNull @NotBlank String routingKey, @NotNull @Valid @NotNull @Valid AsyncMessageDTO<T> messagingPost)
      Posts a message to the broker.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of bean associated to the message.
      Parameters:
      routingKey - the routing key to use.
      messagingPost - the message to post.
